  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class TuringClientCommandLineInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientUserInterface
    Exposes and implements Client services for the Turing application

      • saveSection

        private void saveSection​(java.lang.String documentName,
                         int section,
                         java.lang.String content)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Store the content of the section being edited in a persistent location for later work.
        Parameters:
        documentName - name of the document whose section is being edited
        section - number of the section being edited
        content - content of the section bein edited
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the cached file does not exist and cannot be created

      • getSavedSection

                                                             int section)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • saveUserId

        private void saveUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Store users's UUID in a persistent location for later work. The stored ID is transparently used by the logout procedure. Only one user at a time can store his ID in the cached file.
        Parameters:
        userId - the UUID to be stored
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the credentials file does not exist and cannot be created

      • getSavedUserId

        private java.util.Optional<java.util.UUID> getSavedUserId()
        Retrieve the previously stored user's UUID
        Returns:
        user's ID wrapped in an Optional.

                                                         java.lang.String successString,
                                                         java.lang.String failureString,
                                                         boolean includeAuth)

      • register

        public void register​(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Invoke the remote registration service published by the server and print the response to screen.
        Specified by:
        register in interface ClientUserInterface
        Parameters:

      • login

        public void login​(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Send a login request to the server and wait for a response. If any response is received, it will be printed on screen. Note: In case of a successful login, the server returns an unique ID to use as an authentication token for subsequent requests.
        Specified by:
        login in interface ClientUserInterface
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - the password of the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Send a login request to the server and wait for a response. If any response is received, it will be printed on screen. The credentials to be sent to the server have been previously cached.
        Specified by:
        logout in interface ClientUserInterface

      • create

        public void create​(java.lang.String document,
                   int sections)
        Send a 'create document' request to the server If any response is received, it will be printed on screen. The credentials to be sent to the server have been previously cached.
        Specified by:
